body: Hi Abraham, You are not the only one and here is the temporary solution: [http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/fail-to-upd...](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/fail-to-update-hb-and-lb?commentId=2985220%3AComment%3A1149608&groupId=2985220%3AGroup%3A658987)
